mapper.select: SELECT BN_NO ,BN_REG_NO ,BN_NM ,OWNER_NM ,BN_REG_CARD ,BN_ADDR_SIDO ,BN_ADDR_SIGG ,BN_ADDR_DTL ,MST_MBR_ID ,CARD_CHK_YN ,BN_PN_NO ,BN_IMG FROM TBL003 WHERE BN_NO = (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId}))

SELECT BN_MBR_ID ,MBR_NM ,MST_MBR_YN ,SELLER_PRMS ,LGIN_AVL_YN ,ACTV_YN ,DATE_FORMAT(AMD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS AMD_DT ,(SELECT cf_get_mbr_nm(AMD_MBR_ID)) AS AMD_MBR_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(AUTH_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS AUTH_DT FROM TBL002 WHERE BN_NO = (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId}))
AND MBR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchTerm},'%')
AND BN_MBR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchTerm},'%')
ORDER BY MST_MBR_YN DESC, INP_DT ASC

SELECT BRD_NO ,BRD_TITLE ,SHOW_YN ,BRD_REG_DT ,BRD_WRITER_NM FROM ( SELECT BN_NO ,BRD_NO ,BRD_TITLE ,SHOW_YN ,DATE_FORMAT(BRD_REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS BRD_REG_DT ,(SELECT cf_get_mbr_nm(SRCTBL.BRD_WRITER)) AS BRD_WRITER_NM FROM TBL012 SRCTBL ) SELTBL WHERE SELTBL.BN_NO = (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId}))
AND SELTBL.BRD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchTerm},'%')
AND SELTBL.BRD_WRITER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchTerm},'%')
ORDER BY SELTBL.BRD_REG_DT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL012 SET SHOW_YN = 'N' ,AMD_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE BN_NO = ( SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId}) ) AND BRD_NO = #{brdNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BRD_TITLE ,BRD_CONT ,BRD_ATT_FILE_1 ,BRD_ATT_FILE_2 ,SHOW_YN ,DATE_FORMAT(INP_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS INP_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(BRD_REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS BRD_REG_DT ,BRD_WRITER AS BRD_WRITER_ID ,(SELECT cf_get_mbr_nm(BRD_WRITER)) AS BRD_WRITER_NM FROM TBL012 WHERE BN_NO = (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})) AND BRD_NO = #{brdNo}
